doc:
Pamela Mason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pamela_Mason 0 Pamela Mason (10 March 1916 – 29 June 1996), also known as Pamela Kellino, was an English actress, author, and screenwriter, known for being the creative partner and first wife of English actor James Mason. Pamela_Mason ( 10_March_1916 – 29_June_1996 ) , also_known as Pamela_Kellino , was an_English_actress , author , and screenwriter , known for being the_creative_partner_and_first_wife of English_actor_James_Mason .
